title: The refuge area shall have a door which shall be painted or fixed with a sign in luminous paint ment
clause_text: The refuge area shall have a door which shall be painted or fixed with a sign in luminous paint mentioning “REFUGE AREA” The lift/s shall not be permitted to open into the refuge areas. The refuge area provided within building line shall be accessible from common passage/ staircase.
